0.text: Innate: When Akali damages an enemy  champion with an ability, she creates a ring around them for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent damaging abilities against champions. While moving away from the ring, she gains 30 / 40 / 50 / 60% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Only one ring may be active at a time.

1.text: If Akali exits the ring within its duration, she regains the bonus movement speed while moving towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and becomes empowered with Swinging Kama for 4 seconds, during which she cannot create another ring.

2.text: Swinging Kama: Akali's next basic attack has its  range doubled and deals 35 − 182 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 55% AP) bonus magic damage.

0.text: Active: Akali unleashes kunais in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Targets at maximum range are also  slowed by 50% for 0.5 seconds.

Active: Akali restores  80 energy over 0.4 seconds, gains  bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds, and detonates a smoke bomb a fixed distance away in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain, and will expand toward nearby enemy champions. While the shroud is active, Akali's maximum energy is increased by 80.

1.text: Entering the shroud renders Akali  invisible, unless she is  dashing.

2.text: Declaring a basic attack or casting an ability will break the invisibility and prevent Akali from entering it for 1 − 0.625 (based on minutes) seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and casts.

3.text: The  marked section of Twilight Shroud will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.

0.text: Active: Akali  flips backward and, after the cast time, sends a shuriken in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: The shuriken marks the enemy or the last  smoke section hit for 3 seconds,  revealing them for the duration. While the target or smoke section is marked, Shuriken Flip can be recast.

2.text: Recast: Akali  dashes towards the marked target or smoke section, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies it deals magic damage upon arrival.

3.text: Akali will not flip backwards if she is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time.  Twilight Shroud and  Perfect Execution can be cast during the recast's dash.

0.text: Active: Akali  dashes 750 units in the direction of the target enemy  champion, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through.

1.text: If Akali hits an enemy, she flips over them to continue the dash up to its normal range but for at least another 150 units.

2.text: Perfect Execution can be recast after a 2.5-second static cooldown within 10 seconds of the first activation.

3.text: Recast: Akali  dashes 800 units in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies she passes through, increased by 0% − 200% (based on target's missing health).
